ca_cert.description: The path to the Jenkins self-signed certificate.

server_url.description: The URL of the Jenkins server to connect to.

domain.description: The domain namespace that the credentials will be added to.

folder.description: The folder namespace that the credentials will be added to.

name.description: The identifier assigned to the credentials.

password.description: The credentials user password. If left empty will be unmanaged.

scope.description: The Jenkins scope assigned to the credentials.

description.description: The description of this folder's purpose.

name.description: The unique name of the JenkinsCI folder. Subfolders may be specified as foldername/name.

permissions.description: The Jenkins permissions sets that provide additional access to this folder.

template.description: The configuration file template, used to communicate with Jenkins.

name.description: The unique name of the JenkinsCI job. Folders may be specified as foldername/name.

parameters.description: The set of parameters to be rendered in the template when generating a valid config.xml file.

template.description: The configuration file template, used to communicate with Jenkins.
